long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Apple Shooter is an engaging game available as a Chrome extension. In this game, the objective is to shoot all the apples on the screen by selecting from a variety of arrow types, including rocket, guided, exploding, and hammer arrows. Players can collect balloons for points and coins to gain additional arrows. The game features detailed character customization and a total of 17 levels to complete. While collecting balloons is not necessary to finish each level, they contribute to the overall score. Apple Shooter provides a fun and challenging experience for players looking to hone their aim and strategy skills. The game can be played for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.


*Note:We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
